resources.string:
To: Father 
 Thanks for being my hero! Hope you are always blessed with health and happiness. 
Love , 
Your Son
"

\n A card containing a message of good wishes, usually sent to someone to celebrate an event such as a birthday. It also can offer moral boost or motivation when someone is on unwell situation like sickness or mourning. \n
2. Why does he send the card? Because he wants to.â€¦
